sn35.150:4.3: katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, nibbānasappāyā paṭipadā?
sn35.150:4.4: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.150:6.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.150:8.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35.150:12.3: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.150:14.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.150:16.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35.150:18.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati … pe …
sn35.150:18.2: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.150:18.6: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, nibbānasappāyā paṭipadā”ti.
